about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"Ghost:Reborn" is a 2D pixel horizontal action game with a Chinese cyber theme. While wandering in the world, players use the dual identities of demon-slayer and assassin killer to jump through different scenes, discover the truth of the broken world, and repair the broken order.

Game Background

Since when, people who have lost their history have gradually been alienated into henchmen. Henchmen no longer have self-awareness, but numbly seek the memory or consciousness of others to feed on. They have vague memories of the vivid memories of the past, and vaguely believe that they can return to the beautiful past as long as they eat the consciousness of others. But this is just a temporary solution. Over time, more and more people have become henchmen. Henchmen no longer have hope for the present and the future, leading to the irreversible decline of civilization...

Game Features

[Dual Identity | Time and Space Switch]

When attacking minions, you can absorb the few remaining glimmers of humanity from them. With the power of the glimmer, you can jump through different time and space and switch different scenes.

[Spirit Transformation | Turn Enemies into Friends]

Some minions still have some consciousness. Defeat them and absorb their soul essence to use for your own benefit.

[Special Mechanism | Mechanism Interaction]

There will be different special mechanisms in different time and space scenes. Sometimes outsmarting may be more interesting than killing them.

[Fragmented Narrative | Multiple Endings]

You may encounter NPCs from different time and space. Your behavior and choices will make them friends or enemies. Once you embark on the journey, the cycle of fate will begin to turn.

[Seamless combos｜Silky feel]

Attack, sprint, dodge, jump, land, and slash, a set of combos is extremely smooth.
